price: And We have created everything in pairs[15], so that you may take heed.
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ
footnotes: [15] Such as day and night, male and female, light and darkness, sweet and bitter, hot and cold, etc.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
